# Introduction

![](img/tmp_cru_2013.png)

This is a project aiming to collect the most used weather datasets for Africa by development economist, analyze their distinctive predictive power for agricutural output and conflict, and give a recommendation about when and how to improve their use. I will update the current state of the project soon.
